scripts.clean: bash -c 'find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name ".turbo" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name "generated" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && if [ "$0" != "" ]; then find . -name "package-lock.json" -type f -exec rm -f {} +; fi' --
